Package main

Class GameEnvironment

java.lang.Object
main.GameEnvironment
public class GameEnvironment extends Object
The GameEnvironment class stores all game variables that made sense to be static, such as the user's team and inventory.
The class also contains static methods that made sense to be available to all classes without creating an instance of the GameEnvironment class.
Version:
1.1, May 2023.
Author:
Lachlan Stewart and Stephen Hockey
